neural network - based sentence model.from sentence: In this paper , we show that a neural network - based sentence model can be applied to the task of answer sentence selection .

two distributional sentence models.from sentence: We construct two distributional sentence models ; first a bag - of - words model , and second , a bigram model based on a convolutional neural network .

supervised model.from sentence: Assuming a set of pre-trained semantic word embeddings , we train a supervised model to learn a semantic matching between question and answer pairs .

enhanced version.from sentence: We also present an enhanced version of this model , which combines the signal of the distributed matching algorithm with two simple word matching features .
